casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Larabee, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Larabee (1995), 72 Ohio St.3d 54.]

(No. 94-2556 Submitted March 7, 1995 Decided April 19, 1995.) Richard L. Ross, Special Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant. Harry R. Reinhart; Lantz, Lantz & Lipp Co., L.P.A., and Charles J. Lantz, for appellee.

The discretionary appeal is allowed. The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of State v. Bidinost (1994), 71 Ohio St.3d 449, 644 N.E.2d 318.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur.
